1.name: kiet the dev
1.text: welcome to my secret chamber, pretty cozy in here right ?

2.name: kiet the dev
2.text: oh! you have found my key, i had to use my window to go in and out before you came

4.name: kiet the dev
4.text: haven't kiet the seller told you ? the let me introduce myself, i am kiet this game developer
